Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Suspends certain provisions relating to petitions for incorporation of a village
Summary: Suspends certain provisions relating to petitions for incorporation of a village until December 31, 2024; directs the department of state to conduct a study on the existing laws and regulations regarding the incorporation, merger, and dissolution of municipalities for the purpose of making recommendations of amendments to such laws.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the village law, in relation to incorporation of villages; relating to directing a municipal re-organization study; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
